about_the_game:
Super Citycon is a retro-inspired city-building game designed for players who love building, creating, and strategizing. With a friendly, nostalgic visual style reminiscent of classic 16-bit era city-building games, it has been reimagined in 3D with modern controls. Super Citycon offers a charming and engaging gameplay journey for all enthusiasts.

Key Features:

  • Huge Maps, Endless Creativity: Build sprawling cities with massive maps, powered by a custom-made terrain system, perfect for ambitious creators.

  • Multiple Game Modes: Explore different playstyles with a sandbox mode for unrestricted creativity, a map creator for designing custom maps, and a tycoon puzzle mode where strategic building combinations unlock bonuses to maximize your population.

  • Super Citycon Unlimited: Unlike its mobile predecessor, this PC version is a premium experience with no in-app purchases, ads, or paywalls—just pure city-building fun from start to finish.

  • Strategic Depth: Solve building placement puzzles to optimize bonuses and unlock the full potential of your city.

Whether you're a retro city-building enthusiast, a voxel art fan, or someone who enjoys challenging strategic puzzles, Super Citycon is for you.

Wishlist now to be among the first to shape the cities of your dreams and join us on this journey!

Join the Community! Stay updated on development progress, share your thoughts, and be among the first to influence the future of Super Citycon Unlimited.
Follow us now and be ready to join when the game launches!
